sentences.english: The gate to the sublime Dharma was therefore opened there.
sentences.chinese: 锡金正法之门在此开启。

sentences.english: This, and only by this, can the Dharma truly infuse our minds.
sentences.chinese: 只有这样，才能使正法真正融入自相续。

sentences.english: This is exactly the special form that is adapted for Fa-rectification disciples.
sentences.chinese: 这是正法时期大法弟子证实法的特殊形式。

sentences.english: We must perpetuate the Proper Dharma.
sentences.chinese: 一定要令正法常住于世。

sentences.english: Realizing the significance of this dharma you will be freed of defilements in a short time.
sentences.chinese: 了解了这正法的意义，你将在短时间内解脱于烦恼。

sentences.english: Instead of telling people to cultivate, they try to destroy the Dharma.
sentences.chinese: 不愿正法住世，所以故意来破坏，不教人修行。

sentences.english: One with a mind like this is called one who has virtue and Dhamma.
sentences.chinese: 拥有这样一颗心的人，才能叫做拥有善德和正法的人。

sentences.english: Here, the Omniscient Buddha points out the criterion of the true Dhamma.
sentences.chinese: 这里，佛陀指出了判断正法的标准。

sentences.english: But in return for preaching, they will require money and luxuries .
sentences.chinese: 然而，为了宣讲正法，他们索取金钱和奢侈品。

sentences.english: Every brother, sister and grandchild practice in the correct method then the ghosts will run away.
sentences.chinese: 每个兄弟姐妹和孙子修习正法，那么这些鬼就会跑掉。

sentences.english: Proper Dharma is the approach by which we get to understand and grasp the truth of the universe.
sentences.chinese: 所谓正法，就是正确认识和撑握宇宙真理的方法。
